summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing a grant agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance to purchase computer equipment and software to increase the efficiency in scheduling patrol officers and improve the crime analysis information available for joint problem solving partnerships with the community under the COPS MORE program; accepting the money when received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budget of the Police Department; and making an appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
